name: Growth Hormone Foundation Stack
mechanism: GHRH + GHS creates synergistic GH release. Tesamorelin provides the 'signal' while Ipamorelin amplifies the 'release'. Research suggests the combination produces 3-5x greater GH output than either alone.
cycling: Can run continuously or cycle 5 days on, 2 days off
synergy_notes: The combination of GHRH analog (Tesamorelin) and GHS (Ipamorelin) creates a more physiological GH pulse than either alone
considerations: Effects on body composition typically visible after 3-6 months
